hero.title: Submit Your Referral. Earn Your Reward.
hero.subtitle: As a valued Pueblo Bonito Owner, you're one step away from inviting friends and family to discover our resorts. Share their details today and unlock exclusive rewards created especially for you.

login.title: Owner Login
login.successMessage: Check your email for a secure sign-in link.
login.errorMessage: There was an error sending the magic link. Please try again.

requirements.title: Referral Guest Requirements
requirements.subtitle: Please ensure your guests meet these requirements:
requirements.ageRequirement: Guests must be between 30 and 69 years old
requirements.marriedRequirement: If married, both spouses must attend together
requirements.presentationRequirement: Attend a 90-minute breakfast presentation the morning after arrival
requirements.idRequirement: Present valid government ID + at least one active Visa or Mastercard
requirements.validFor: Married couples, cohabiting couples, and single women
requirements.offerValidity: Offer must be used within 18 months of purchase date
requirements.reservations: Reservations subject to availability; holiday blackout dates apply

hero.title: You've Been Invited to Experience Pueblo Bonito
hero.subtitle: You've been personally invited by a Pueblo Bonito Owner to enjoy an exclusive stay at our resorts. Complete the form below to begin your experience and unlock preferred guest benefits.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step2: Our team will contact you to confirm availability and details

shareLink.title: Share Your Referral Link
shareLink.description: Share this unique link with friends and family. When they register, you'll automatically be credited as the referrer.

guestConfirmation.subject: Thank you for your interest in Pueblo Bonito
guestConfirmation.body: Hello {guestName}, Thank you for your interest in Pueblo Bonito. We've received your information and our team will contact you shortly. Warm regards, Pueblo Bonito Team

ownerConfirmation.subject: Your referral has been received
ownerConfirmation.body: Hello {ownerName}, We've received your referral for {guestName} ({destination}). Our team has been notified and will follow up. You will receive updates as it progresses. Pueblo Bonito Referral Program

ownerStageUpdate.subject: Update on your referral
ownerStageUpdate.body: Hello {ownerName}, Your referral {guestName} is now in stage: {stage}. Thank you for being part of Pueblo Bonito.

ownerClosedWon.subject: Your referral was successful — $200 F&B credit
ownerClosedWon.body: Congratulations {ownerName}, Your referral {guestName} was successfully completed. You have earned a $200 Food & Beverage credit. Our team will contact you with the next steps.
